column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: Timestamp automatically generated and user not allowed to change. The actual date of entry.

column.name: PatternSecondary
column.summary: Time pattern, X for secondary provider time, / for spacing. Stored in 5 minute increments. Converted as needed to 10 or 15 minute representations for display. This could be Dr or Hyg, depending on if the IsHyg box is checked. Does not have any effect on appointment length. Probably same length as Pattern, but no guarantee.

column.name: IsEnabled
column.summary: Enables/Disables the ApptReminderRule.

column.name: TemplateAutoReply
column.summary: Used when auto replying single eConfirmations.

column.name: TemplateAutoReplyAgg
column.summary: Used when auto replying multiple patient eConfirmations.

column.name: IsAutoReplyEnabled
column.summary: Enables/Disables eConfirmation auto replies. Only for when the patient responds positively via text.

column.name: ApptThankYouSentNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ApptNum
column.summary: FK to appointment.AptNum.

column.name: ApptDateTime
column.summary: The Date and time of the original appointment. We need this in case the appointment was moved and needs another reminder sent out.

column.name: ApptSecDateTEntry
column.summary: The Date and time of the original appointment. We need this in case the appointment was moved and needs another reminder sent out.

column.name: TSPrior
column.summary: This was the TSPrior used to send this reminder.

column.name: ApptReminderRuleNum
column.summary: FK to apptreminderrule.ApptReminderRuleNum. Allows us to look up the rules to determine how to send this apptcomm out.

column.name: IsSmsSent
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Indicates whether or not we were able to send the text message.

column.name: IsForSms
column.summary: Generated by OD. If true then generate and send sms.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum for the corresponding appointment.

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: FK to patient.PatNum for the corresponding patient.

column.name: PhonePat
column.summary: Generated by OD. Wireless phone number of the corresponding patient.

column.name: ResponseDescript
column.summary: Generated by OD in some cases and HQ in others. Any human readable error message generated by either HQ or EConnector. Used for debugging.

column.name: GuidMessageToMobile
column.summary: FK to smstomobile.GuidMessage. Generated at HQ when the thankyou is generated.

column.name: MsgTextToMobileTemplate
column.summary: Generated by OD. OD proper can construct this to be any length. Will be converted to final MsgText and sent to patient once tags are replaced with real values.

column.name: MsgTextToMobile
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Applied real text to tags from MsgTextTemplate.

column.name: EmailTextTemplate
column.summary: Generated by OD. Includes [ConfirmCode] replacement tag and (optionally) [URL] replacement tag. OD proper can construct this to be any length. Will be converted to final EmailText and emailed to patient once tags are replaced with real values.

column.name: EmailText
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Applied real text to tags from EmailTextTemplate.

column.name: DateTimeThankYouTransmit
column.summary: Generated by OD. Timestamp when EConnector sent this ApptThankYouSent to HQ. Stored in local customer timezone.

column.name: Status
column.summary: Enum:AutoCommStatus Generated by OD in some cases and HQ in others. Indicates current status in the lifecycle of this ApptThankYouSent.

Enumeration.name: AutoCommStatus
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Should not be in the database but can be used in the program.
2 - Has not been attempted to send yet.
4 - Attempted to send but not successful.

column.name: ShortGuidEmail
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Identifies this ApptThankYouSent in future transactions between HQ and OD. Will be used for email thankyous only.

column.name: ShortGUID
column.summary: Generated by HQ. Identifies this ApptThankYouSent in future transactions between HQ and OD. Will be used for sms thankyous only.

column.name: HasClinicBreakdownReports
column.summary: If set to True, display clinic breakdown in reports, else only show practice totals.

column.name: HelpButtonXAdjustment
column.summary: Starting X value if user has moved the help button. This is stored as a percentage (100%=1.0).

column.name: ApptReminderRuleNum
column.summary: FK to ApptReminderRule.ApptReminderRuleNum.

column.name: FeeSchedGroupNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: FeeSchedNum
column.summary: FK to FeeSched.FeeSchedNum.

column.name: ClinicNums
column.summary: Comma delimited list of Clinic.ClinicNums.

column.name: InvoiceNum
column.summary: Optional invoice number

column.name: MobileDataByteNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: RawBase64Data
column.summary: The bytes in Base64.

column.name: RawBase64Code
column.summary: The unlock code in Base64. Blank if no unlock code required to retrieve.

column.name: RawBase64Tag
column.summary: Misc data in Base64

column.name: PatNum
column.summary: Can be 0.

column.name: ActionType
column.summary: Stores the intended action associated to this rows data.

column.name: DateTimeEntry
column.summary: The DateTime this row was entered.

column.name: DateTimeExpires
column.summary: The DateTime that this row should be removed.

column.name: FeeInsPrimary
column.summary: The amount that primary insurance will cover for the entire ortho case.

column.name: IsActive
column.summary: Determines whether or not this is an active ortho case

column.name: FeeInsSecondary
column.summary: The amount that secondary insurance will cover for the entire ortho case. Will be set to zero if patient doesn't have secondary insurance

column.name: ProcLinkType
column.summary: Enum:OrthoProcType Indicates what type of procedure is being associated to Ortho Case in link.

Enumeration.name: OrthoProcType
Enumeration.summary: A procedures type as it relates to an Ortho Case
Enumeration.EnumValue: 2 - All maintenance visits between Banding and Debond procedures.

column.name: BandingAmount
column.summary: Amount to charge for banding procedure.

column.name: VisitAmount
column.summary: Used every visit until the total off all visits+BandingAmount+DebondAmount=Fee of linked OrthoCase.

column.name: DebondAmount
column.summary: Amount to charge for debond procedure.

column.name: ShortCodeOptIn
column.summary: Indicates if the patient has opted in, out, or not yet to using Short Codes for Appointment Texts.

column.name: Consent
column.summary: Enum:PatConsentFlags None=0,ShareMedicationHistoryErx=1, Indicates if the patient consents for DoseSpot to access their medication history, bitwise.

Enumeration.name: PatConsentFlags
Enumeration.EnumValue: 1 - Patient consents for eRx to access their medication history

column.name: IsTokenSaved
column.summary: Whether or not the credit card token can be saved for future uses.

column.name: PayToken
column.summary: The payment token used to poll the processing status.

column.name: ExpDateToken
column.summary: Provides the Expiration Date of the account being accessed. Format is yyMM from XWeb gateway. Will be converted to ExpirationDate.

column.name: RefNumber
column.summary: The RefNumber associated to this transaction. Will only be set for Completed PayConnectWebStatuses.

column.name: TransType
column.summary: The Transaction Type associated to this transaction. Will only be set for Completed PayConnectWebStatuses.

column.name: CatPercUCR
column.summary: The UCR fee for the procedure. Cannot be changed by the user.

column.name: OrderQty
column.summary: The amount to order when the next SupplyOrder is created. Creating a SupplyOrder then zeroes this out, so it's just a temporary value.

column.name: DateReceived
column.summary: The date the order was received. If the SupplyOrder existed before updating to version 19.4, then this value will be set to the date the office updated to 19.4.
